transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan sir bataiye. Hello, main mam se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Good morning mam, Shubham baat kar raha tha senior manager IndiaMART.
Customer: Good morning. Sir aapse contact karne ke liye mujhe bada mushkiliya ho kar aana padta hai.
Executive: Mere se?
Customer: Haan. Mere se aap mera number likh lena Tulsian Health ke.
Executive: Haan Tulsian Health ke Private Limited matlab mere andar main senior mere andar Aryan hai Aryan usse wo handle karte hai mam.
Customer: Wo handle karte hai. Okay sir. Haan mere andar aap bhi hamari problem solve karenge ya wo solve karenge?
Executive: Nahi wo dono mam jaise ki wo hote hai aapke point of contact hai if in case koi matlab wo busy hai ya chutti pe hai ya kuch bhi hai if in case nahi ho pa rahi baat to I am there hai na ki main jaise abhi wo training mein hai to maine kabhi call liya directly aapse baat karne ke liye.
Customer: Baat nahi sir. Main ye mera sahi hai sir ye hamare jo leads aa rahe hai sir bahut hi kam amount mein leads aa rahe hai matlab main mostly dekhti hu ki Monday ko aaj hi din Sunday aur Monday ko Sunday Monday Saturday include karke hamare paas kafi inquiry rehti thi lekin ye one week se inquiry ka bahut hi kam ho gaya sir inquiry.
Executive: Okay one one week se inquiry ka flow kam ho gaya. Aur inquiry aapki bhi keh rahe hai to genuine inquiry nahi aati thi.
Executive: One week se inquiry ka flow kam ho gaya aur quantity kam ho matlab wo in quantity kam piece mein quantity kam ho gaya aur lead ka aapke paas aana kam ho gaya wo kam ho gaya.
Customer: Nahi aana kam ho gaya piece mein quantity bhi kam hua aana kam ho gaya hai. Accha to aisa filter laga sakte hai kya ki retailer matlab retailer aur wholesaler aur semi wholesaler tak hi hamare tak contact kare. Consumer contact sir hum provide nahi karwa payenge wo cheeze.
Executive: Ek ek bulk ka filter hota hai mam ek bulk ka filter jisme aap na aap bulk ka filter hota hai ek.
Customer: Haan wo to main filter use karti hu but aap nahi usse do cheeze hai mam aap kya karte ho main aap na wo aap sirf jab buyleads karte hai laga kar check karte hoge.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai. I am saying ki aapko na bulk ka beta jaise ki aapke paas wo aata hai ki value ke sab lead type mein GST ka option aata hai. GST ka to aap GST laga ke save kar loge na save karna hoga ye nahi laga ke check karna laga ke check karna means ki 10 lead hai usme se jo dikha dega. Aap save kar loge to automatic aapke profile mein filter save ho jayega aur exactly leads fir aapko aana shuru ho jayegi jaise aap demand kar rahe hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Wo leads aapke paas aana shuru ho jayegi. Ye hai. Hai na baki baki to nahi to jaise aap agar aapko retailer aur wo chahiye jaise jaise mostly retailer chahe end user connect kare to why don't you matlab main waise ek suggestion hai aapki to khud ki website bhi hogi wo kyu promote karo na website se jyada log retailer connect karte hai aapke paas.
Customer: Ye hai na. Sir. Hello.
Executive: Main yes mam. Haan sir bataiye.
Executive: Haan mera matlab ye kehna hai jaise aapke Tulsian Health ke Private Limited hai aapko pata hai market mein jaise aapko abhi connect kar rahe hai sab log to jaise aapko mostly retailer aur wo chahiye so aap apna matlab khud ka ek company ka website kyu nahi promote kar rahe hai taki wo retailer aur jo bhi hote hai na wo directly aapki website par reach kare aur waha se aapke product dekhte hai aapko connect kare. You should have your own website taki jyada se jyada buyer aur jo retailer hai wo reach kare abhi kya hota hai ki IndiaMART pe retailer bhi wholesaler bhi aur end user bhi search kar rahe hote hai teeno search kar rahe hote hai mam.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Teeno kar rahe hote hai na to wo teeno aapke paas aate hai abhi teeno hi aa rahe hai but aapke khud ke own domain ho jayega khud ka tulsian.com ho jayega to jo bhi jitne bhi retailer hote hai wo directly website ke through matlab goods purchase karna jyada prefer karte hai.
Executive: Aur aapka khud ka manufacture iska hoga na wholesale hai na aapka ek sab.
Customer: Hello. Ji sir aap usme kuch kar sakte hai modify wagera ya kuch?
Executive: Haan bilkul main apni taraf se matlab ye main guide kar sakta hu filter aapko apni taraf se wo save karna hoga mam.
Customer: Bataiye.
Executive: Hai na aap apna IndiaMART ka open kariye ek baar.
Customer: Sir main open karti hu baithi hu.
Executive: Haan to dekhiye aap India pe click kariye aur buyleads pe jaiye aur India pe click kariye.
Customer: Buyleads pe jaake India pe click karna hai. India pe click karna hai yes mam.
Customer: Ek minute sir.
Customer: Haan sir bataiye.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Buyleads pe gaye uske baad aap jaiye order value laga dijiye above 1 lakh ya 50000 jo bhi lagana ho aapko 50000 laga lijiye.
Customer: Sir ye saare ye saare cheeze to mujhe pehle se pata hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi main aapko bata raha hu mujhe bhi pata hai mam ye main save nahi main ye laga ke dekhne ke liye nahi keh raha aap aage chaliye to main aapko bata raha hu kya karna hai.
Customer: Haan theek hai. I know.
Executive: Haan 50 sir lead lead type hoga usko GST GST wale pe click kariye.
Customer: Accha ye bade gawar ho tum log. Hello.
Executive: GST GST wale pe click kariye mam.
Customer: GST.
Executive: Lead type pe GST wale pe jyada GST.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Kar liya ab uske niche aayega to dekhega save filter likha hua option aayega uspe click kariye save karne ke liye.
Customer: Save filter. Hai na uspe click karenge to wo aapke name mangega is name.
Customer: Haan sir save filter aa raha hai. Ab haan name likh dijiye retailer ya wholesaler ya jo bhi apni company ka naam likh dijiye uspe naam mang raha hai to.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Naam likh ke niche save kariye usko.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Kar diya mam?
Customer: Ek second sir. Hai na to abhi tak aap kya hoga check kar rahe hoge aap agar aapne kabhi save karke nahi rakha hoga ye filter ab save ho jayega. Hai na haan. Haan haan hame nahi guide kiya gaya aapki taraf se.
Executive: Haan to wahi wahi main keh raha hu tabhi maine ye guide kar diya taki aapki ye problem resolve aap dheere dheere karke kya hoga aapki problem retailer wali resolve ho jayegi aapke paas jyada se jyada retailer ke connect jyada aane lagenge jo bhi jinke GST verified jinhone GST le rakhe honge wo log daalenge kyuki end user to nahi le raha GST wo to alag se requirement aata hai na.
Customer: Haan haan. To ye hai to aapka ye problem dheere dheere karke resolve ho jayega.
Customer: Okay sir. Theek hai. Aur sab leads ka kya hoga?
Executive: Kiska? Leads ka. Haan na wo to mam abhi main abhi isko filter matlab kara ke saari cheeze proper kara dunga leads ka aapka. Haan. Bhej ke wo wo theek ho jayega mam aapka. Ek dum se increase slow badh jayega kabhi kabhar kya hota hai kisi week flow thoda sa kam hota hai na to leads aapka aa jayega abhi main isko check kara ke fir ye proper kara dunga jaisa aapka pehle tha.
Customer: Haan sir. Theek hai. Theek hai sir. Aur koi mam kuch aur?
Customer: Sir ye aapke side se hi hoga kya aap jo keh rahe hai ki haan ye wala to ye leads wala to hamare portal se hi hoga na.
Customer: Theek hai sir aap ye kar dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai mam theek hai baki aapka concern tha to iske liye aapne call kiya tha to meri call ka feedback aayega please use yes bhej dijiyega mam.
Customer: Okay sir. Theek hai thank you mam. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Low number of leads and genuine inquiries.

- Wants only retailers, wholesalers, semi-wholesalers to contact.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to save filters with GST.

- Suggested promoting own website for retailer connections.

- Will check and fix the lead flow.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check and fix lead flow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, filters, website, retailers, gst

seller_categories.mcat_name: Dr Morepen Blood Glucose Test Strips
